thread.title: Sounders broadcaster Fletcher to leave club
thread.title_full: Sounders broadcaster Fletcher to leave club

author: The Associated Press
title: Sounders broadcaster Fletcher to leave club
text: Sounders broadcaster Fletcher to leave club The Associated Press Print this article Advertisement SEATTLE — Sounders broadcaster Ross Fletcher will leave the club at the end of this season, the team announced Thursday on its website, bringing to an end a four-year tenure in Seattle. Fletcher had spent the preceding decade-plus covering the English Premier League and Championship, first for Derby County then with BBC Radio 5 Live. He replaced fellow Englishman Arlo White, who left the Sounders to become the lead play-by-play voice of NBC Sports’ EPL coverage.
